summary: Slovenia is a small, mountainous country in Central Europe, located between Italy, Austria, Hungary, and Croatia. It has a population of around 2.1 million people and its capital is Ljubljana. The country has a long history, having been part of various empires, and it gained independence from Yugoslavia in 1991. Today, Slovenia is a developed country with a strong economy and high living standards. It is a member of many important international organizations, such as the European Union and NATO.
title: Slovenia
